Description_lang: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn with Heartfire, dealing an additional $s2% of damage dealt over $408399d. Heartfire heals you for $s3% of the damage it deals.
AuraDescription_lang: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn for $408399d seconds with Heartfire, dealing an additional $w2% damage over time and healing you for $w3% of the damage dealt by your Heartfire.

description_blz.en_US: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn with Heartfire, dealing an additional 20% of damage dealt over 5 sec. Heartfire heals you for 100% of the damage it deals.
description_blz.es_MX: Escudo de vengador hace que los objetivos alcanzados ardan con Corazón de fuego y reciban un 20% más de daño durante 5 s. Corazón de fuego te cura una cantidad equivalente al 100% del daño infligido.
description_blz.pt_BR: Escudo do Vingador faz o alvo atingido queimar com Fogo do Coração, causando 20% a mais de dano ao longo de 5 s. O Fogo do Coração concede a você uma cura equivalente a 100% do dano que causa.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Schild des Rächers' lässt getroffene Ziele mit 'Herzensfeuer' brennen, was zusätzlich 20% des verursachen Schadens im Verlauf von 5 Sek. verursacht. 'Herzensfeuer' heilt Euch um 100% seines verursachten Schadens.
description_blz.en_GB: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn with Heartfire, dealing an additional 20% of damage dealt over 5 sec. Heartfire heals you for 100% of the damage it deals.
description_blz.es_ES: Escudo de vengador provoca que los objetivos golpeados ardan con Corafuego, lo que inflige un 20% del daño infligido a lo largo de 5 s. Corafuego te sana un 100% del daño que inflige.
description_blz.fr_FR: Bouclier du vengeur inflige Cœur de feu aux cibles touchées, ce qui les brûle et augmente les dégâts sur la durée qu’elles subissent de 20% pendant 5 s. Vous récupérez un montant de points de vie égal à 100% des dégâts infligés par Cœur de feu.
description_blz.it_IT: Scudo del Vendicatore fa bruciare il bersaglio con Cuordifuoco, infliggendo il 20% di danni aggiuntivi in 5 s. Cuordifuoco ti cura del 100% dei danni inflitti.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Щит мстителя" поджигает цели "Сердечным огнем", нанося еще 20% периодического урона за 5 сек. "Сердечный огонь" восстанавливает вам здоровье в объеме 100% от своего урона.
description_blz.ko_KR: 응징의 방패가 적중당한 대상을 타오르는 심장으로 불태워 5초에 걸쳐 입힌 피해의 20%에 해당하는 추가 피해를 입힙니다. 타오르는 심장은 입힌 피해의 100%만큼 생명력을 회복시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 復仇之盾使被擊中的目標被心火燃燒，在5秒內額外造成相當於該次傷害20%的傷害，並使你恢復相當於心火傷害100%的生命力。
description_blz.zh_CN: 复仇者之盾使目标被心火点燃，在5秒内额外造成20%的伤害，并为你恢复生命值，数值相当于心火造成伤害的100%。
